extendedInfo.description: The Seattle Public Library in your pocket! Search the catalog, and use My Account to place holds, renew items, check holds. Ask a Librarian via IM, text, or telephone. Check the calendar of events, find your nearest Library location. Discover new or recommended titles. Follow Library blogs and Facebook. Fix for Incredible

reviews.title: Could be better.
reviews.comment: Needs to be an actual app and not a thin web interface. Doesn\'t really look or feel like an android app.  Being able to scan bar codes (for books and library cards, since it keeps forgetting my account number) would be really handy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: After reading the reviews I had a little bit of trepidation  downloading this but almost all of the problems noted in reviews have been fixed. Great app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pops
reviews.comment: Only  shows \"book\" or \"music cd\" in my on hold section. Older version showed the actual title. Am I missing something or is this an actual glitch? If a glitch, please fix ASAP. Great app otherwise!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Generally good, password shouldn\'t be clear text
reviews.comment: It\'s convenient to replace the card with app. But login password is clear text, which concerns me security-wise.
reviews.author: S. Park

reviews.title: What happened?
reviews.comment: I can\'t get into my digital account anymore so unable to download checked out items to my phone. Please fix ASAP!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works good
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Beyond convenient.  Just wish I could pay my fines through the app.
reviews.author: Devin Riley

reviews.comment: Why no surface rt version?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Very happy that the Seattle public library has an app for me to easily access my account and reserve books. A huge time saver for my busy life!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I absolutely love this app! I love that I have a digital copy of my library card to use when I check out items!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Decent
reviews.comment: But 4 stars cuz theres no \"stay signed in\" option and you have to keep signing in everytime
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great functionality
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Am I missing something or does the app not have the \342\200\235Reserve a computer\342\200\235 option? Please add it if it\'s not already available!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love this!
reviews.comment: I can put holds on books without having to write titles on scraps of paper and wait til I get home! Useful search parameters. It\'s brilliant to check on book holds when I\'m actually near the library.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fantastic start. I look forward to seeing this app evolve!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: Let\'s you see most of your account, but still need an actual computer to download kindle books. I wish it would allow checking out kindle books.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Limited search functionality
reviews.comment: Search function is basic.  No advanced parameters?  Useful for managing your account.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Please enable this app to be moved to sd card
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Authentication failed for me after 30 days use. Droid x.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love all the many features. Would be even better if I could log in with username instead of barcode.
reviews.author: A Google User
